author: Adi Robertson
title: How you’ll use Apple and Google’s coronavirus tracking tool
description: Apple and Google are building a contact tracing system for iOS and Android, first as an API for health agency apps and then as a low-level OS feature. Here’s what we know about the system.
content:
Photo by Amelia Holowaty Krales / The Verge
Earlier today, Apple and Google announced a Bluetooth-based COVID-19 contact tracing platform that could alert people if theyve been exposed to the novel coronavirus. Contact tracing is a huge component in ending m… [+5744 chars]
